name: King Fight
description:
A 4-corners auto-spawner “rts” game akin to custom games from Warcraft3 like Footy Arena.

In the end of jam state, the game can technically be “played”, but has no real game loop, and no AI. You can drag-select your units with left mouse, order them to move with right mouse, and order an attack-move by first pressing “A” then issuing a move command. Units move and attack correctly, and will die. Technically, the objective is to keep your king unit alive, but again, there is no real game loop here.
